onboarding_flow.user_action: Tap 'Start Adapting' or hear value prop via VoiceOver
onboarding_flow.content: Welcome to NeuroDash - productivity that adapts to your brain. Quick 2-minute setup to personalize your experience.
onboarding_flow.goal: Communicate core value without overwhelming with features

onboarding_flow.user_action: Try first energy check-in with guided tutorial
onboarding_flow.content: Let's start with how you're feeling right now. This helps NeuroDash suggest the right tasks for your current capacity.
onboarding_flow.goal: Immediate value demonstration through core feature trial

onboarding_flow.user_action: See personalized task suggestions based on energy level
onboarding_flow.content: Based on your energy, here are tasks that match your current capacity. You can always change these later.

onboarding_flow.user_action: Choose to continue as guest or create account for sync
onboarding_flow.content: Continue exploring as a guest, or create an account to save your patterns across devices.
onboarding_flow.goal: Guest-first experience with optional progressive registration

core_usage_flow.user_action: Quick energy level selection (voice or tap)
core_usage_flow.content: How's your energy? Low/Medium/High with optional context note
core_usage_flow.goal: Capture current cognitive capacity with minimal friction

core_usage_flow.content: Tasks filtered and prioritized based on current energy and historical patterns

core_usage_flow.user_action: Start task, modify, or reschedule without guilt
core_usage_flow.content: Flexible task engagement with effort recognition and gentle rescheduling
core_usage_flow.goal: Enable productivity without pressure or shame

core_usage_flow.user_action: Review insights about personal productivity patterns
core_usage_flow.content: Visual insights showing energy patterns and optimal timing for different tasks
core_usage_flow.goal: Build self-awareness and optimize future productivity

primary_navigation.rationale: Bottom tab navigation follows platform conventions and keeps core features accessible in thumb zone. Energy-first ordering emphasizes adaptive nature.

content_hierarchy.organization_principle: Energy-driven hierarchy where all content adapts to current cognitive capacity, with progressive disclosure based on user comfort level

home_screen.layout: Energy indicator at top (large, visual), followed by 3-4 energy-appropriate task suggestions, quick focus session button, and gentle progress celebration
home_screen.accessibility_notes: High contrast energy indicators, minimum 44pt touch targets, VoiceOver labels for all elements, haptic feedback for confirmations

core_feature_screens.purpose: Capture current cognitive capacity with minimal friction
core_feature_screens.layout: Large visual energy scale (Low/Medium/High) with color coding, optional voice note button, and historical pattern context
core_feature_screens.accessibility_notes: High contrast color coding, voice input primary option, large touch targets ≥44pt, clear focus indicators

core_feature_screens.purpose: Present capacity-appropriate task suggestions without overwhelming
core_feature_screens.layout: Energy-filtered task list with cognitive load indicators, duration estimates, and gentle modification options
core_feature_screens.accessibility_notes: Clear task hierarchy, semantic headings, swipe actions with confirmation, reduced motion options

core_feature_screens.purpose: Adaptive focus sessions that match current attention capacity
core_feature_screens.layout: Variable timer with energy-based recommendations, gentle progress tracking, and adaptive break suggestions
core_feature_screens.accessibility_notes: Audio and visual progress indicators, pause/resume accessibility, vibration patterns for transitions

core_feature_screens.purpose: Visual insights into personal productivity patterns without judgment
core_feature_screens.layout: Energy pattern visualization, optimal timing suggestions, and effort celebration rather than completion tracking
core_feature_screens.accessibility_notes: Data visualization with alt text, high contrast charts, voice description of patterns available

primary_actions.interaction: Voice command, large touch target, or slider gesture
primary_actions.feedback: Immediate visual and haptic confirmation with interface adaptation

visual_design_direction.brand_personality: Calm, adaptive, supportive companion that celebrates effort over perfection. Visual language emphasizes flexibility and reduces anxiety through gentle, consistent design.

color_strategy.primary: Energy-adaptive color system: Calm blue for low energy (contrast 4.8:1), warm orange for medium (contrast 5.2:1), vibrant green for high (contrast 4.7:1)
color_strategy.secondary: Neutral grays for secondary content, soft accent colors for celebrations

typography.primary_font: SF Pro for iOS, Roboto for Android (system fonts)
typography.scale_factor: Supports Dynamic Type scaling 100%-200% with readable hierarchy
typography.readability_notes: Minimum 17pt body text, generous line spacing, left-aligned for dyslexia accessibility

screen_reader_support: Descriptive labels for all interactive elements
